name: Car Crash: Robot bus simulator
description:
Get ready for a thrilling adventure with our Robot Shooting Game! With two modes to choose from, you'll be entertained for hours on end. In the first mode, transform into a variety of vehicles including a car, tank, bus, helicopter, and jet fighter to defeat enemies in a bustling city environment. Each mode offers unique abilities, ensuring that you'll never get bored.

In the second mode, hop behind the wheel of a car and hit the open road. But beware, opponents are hot on your tail, and they're not playing nice. You'll need to use your driving and shooting skills to take them down before they take you out. This mode features both city and desert environments, offering a variety of challenges and landscapes to conquer.

It's time to transform, drive, and shoot your way to victory in our Robot Shooting Game!
